rules_text:
Incarnate {4}{W} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 2 or less revealed this way onto the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
